name: insult
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool humor_jokes_and_memes.
Tool description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
API description: Insult somebody for doing something.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Insult for more.

name.description: The name of the person to insult.
